description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics only.

panels.description: Pods that have been deleted cannot be queried.
panels.title: Pod Status

panels.description:
When the pod have resource limit. 
Pod Memory Utilization = working_set / pod_memory_limit

when the pod limit is empty. 
Pod Memory Utilization = working_set / machine_memory_capacity(the node which pod on)
panels.title: Pod memory utilization

panels.description:
Warning when CPU Throttle Rate greater than 25%.

We recomand to settle: https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/178168.html

targets.expr: sum by (container, pod, namespace) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{container!="", namespace="$namespace", pod="$Pod"}[1m])) / sum by (container, pod, namespace) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$Pod"}[1m]))
sum by (container, pod, namespace) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{container!=""}[1m])) / sum by (container, pod, namespace) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{}[1m]))

panels.title: CPU Throttle Rate
